video.title: Rectify
video.synopsis: Convicted of rape and murder at age 18, Daniel Holden spends nearly 20 years on death row until DNA evidence brings the verdict into question.

episodes.synopsis: After 19 years on death row, Daniel Holden is suddenly released. While he adjusts to life on the outside, Sen. Foulkes plots to reopen the case.
episodes.title: Always There

episodes.synopsis: As the family endures an awkward welcome-home party, Amantha worries about Daniel's safety. Ted Jr. fears his return means nothing but trouble.
episodes.title: Sexual Peeling

episodes.synopsis: As Daniel relives happier times before prison, anger about his return begins to boil over in the community.
episodes.title: Modern Times

episodes.synopsis: Janet's day in town with Daniel becomes a media show. Sheriff Daggett looks for a missing witness. Daniel and Tawney connect in unexpected ways.
episodes.title: Plato's Cave

episodes.synopsis: Daniel loses his grip on reality as he wrestles with his new life. Following a surreal night with a stranger, he finds himself at odds with Ted Jr.
episodes.title: Drip, Drip

episodes.synopsis: Just as Daniel begins to accept the challenges of his new life, the town's anger over his release hits its boiling point.
episodes.title: Jacob's Ladder

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of Daniel's beating, his family fears the worst. Meanwhile, Ted Jr. hides a shameful secret from his wife.
episodes.title: Running With The Bull

episodes.synopsis: As Daniel lies in an induced coma, Janet and Amantha await news about his condition. Meanwhile, Teddy's business plans are thwarted.
episodes.title: Sleeping Giants

episodes.synopsis: Loyalties are tested when Daniel makes a startling decision. Elsewhere, Teddy asks a reluctant Tawney for a favor.
episodes.title: Charlie Darwin

episodes.synopsis: While Daniel enjoys a bit of big-city anonymity in Atlanta, Amantha considers a depressing new plan. Teddy reaches out to an unlikely friend.
episodes.title: Donald the Normal

episodes.synopsis: Daniel meets an unusual entrepreneur. Elsewhere, Amantha struggles with a new role, and Tawney makes a surprising decision.
episodes.title: Act As If

episodes.synopsis: Daniel disappears on a strange errand. Janet's family gathers to celebrate her birthday, surprising her with some unexpected gifts.
episodes.title: Mazel Tov

episodes.synopsis: Daniel searches for answers. Jon Stern meets with D.A. Sondra Person. Senator Foulkes tackles an unpleasant task. Amantha bonds with a co-worker.
episodes.title: Weird As You

episodes.synopsis: Daniel reluctantly asks for help. Startling news triggers a heated debate in the Talbot house. C.J. Pickens offers some unsettling information.
episodes.title: The Great Destroyer

episodes.synopsis: Amantha lets off some steam. Ted Jr. is frustrated by recent events. Ted Sr. protects his family. Daniel faces a difficult decision.
episodes.title: Until You're Blue

episodes.synopsis: Daniel questions Jon Stern's advice. Tawney reconsiders her choices, and Ted Jr. asks a favor. Amantha levels with Jon Stern.
episodes.title: Unhinged
